title: RICHARD PRICE font ID
content:
need help identifying the font used in this Richard Price book cover. Many thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/RichardPrice_5138.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RichardPrice.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015738/http:/typophile.com/files/RichardPrice.jpg) | 102.83 KB |

 [‹ [x] Font ID: Beats the heck outta me??!! (Twilight Series) {Tiffany}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44996 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tiffany or not Tiffany? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44985 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Hi Danny,

looks like [DIN Neuzeit Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-grotesk/familytree.html).  
F
